doc.after: Gravitational time dilation has been experimentally measured using atomic clocks on airplanes The clocks aboard the airplanes were slightly faster with respect to clocks on the ground The effect is significant enough that the Global Positioning System s artificial satellites need to have their clocks corrected 5
